column4: Can somebody explain me how to copy files to the write-protected Mozilla-Firefox folder? Im a newb, so please explain it in newb language :)
Yes. So now I can 'write' as root...
Great! This wasnt as tough as I thought :D
Yes I know. I just need to copy my old Firefox files to this one...
you dont need root for that
Well it says I cant copy. Only the owner (root) can...
what did you try to copy?
can you go to #firefox in irc.mozilla.org
Yes. This, however, was a root/sude thing..:)
all though I do need to know how to get mozbackup to work on ubuntu some day
